title: 26. When is a ‘High-Risk’ Pregnancy a Good Thing?
description: Giving birth in the United States can be dangerous for both moms and their kids. Sometimes, that's because of too little medical care — and sometimes, it’s the opposite.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Giving birth in the United States can be dangerous for both moms and their kids. Sometimes, that's because of too little medical care — and sometimes, it’s the opposite.
